## MySQLConnectionOptions.decimalNumbers property

Return `DECIMAL` values as numbers instead of strings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
decimalNumbers?: false;
```

## Remarks

The framework relies on `DECIMAL` values to be returned as strings, therefore this option must be `false` or omitted.
